attributes.action: Ignore proposals to teach children creationism in science lessons as an alterative to evolution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yes, the theory of evolution does have some holes but there is some scientific evidence for it which is why it should be taught it science lessons. The only "evidence" for creationism is "it says so in the Bible". The Bible should not be seen as a scientific text. In the words of St. Augustine "the Bible tells us how to go to heaven not how the heavens go."
